title: Arcade poro icon glitched for anyone else?
body:
theres a black border around it making it a circle instead of a box like its suppost to be.
http://i.imgur.com/iZnvwDf.png

replies.body: Looks like someone accidentally altered one of those files. No worries, I've informed the devs and I've been told that the icon should be going back to square with the rainbow border at some point.
Hope that's not a 'soon TM' (3 weeks broken so far), but thanks for the update.

> [{quoted}](name=Mensot,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=InWBJoFM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-01T17:18:55.266+0000)
>
> just already fix it god {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

most likely next patch its gonna get renewed since it seems like a new look for the icon popped up which i arent that fond of.
